name: Sovranti
description:
What is Sovranti?

Sovranti is an entire board game library that you can play from your PC, tablet or phone. Our rules-enforced gameplay helps folks learn games, keeps track of scoring and gives you the feeling of sitting around a table with friends! Discover our growing catalog of competitive, coop and solo games. Focus on the fun and not spending all your time looking up rules.

What's special about Sovranti?

  • Full rules enforcement! No more guessing how to play the game or forgetting rules.
  • Automated scoring for all games.
  • Feels like sitting around the table with friends. If you can play the game on Sovranti you can play it around the table and vice versa. All of our game look and feel just like they would if you are sitting around a table in person.
  • 3D environments. Want to play in a medieval castle or on the moon? Or maybe you would prefer to play in a garden? The choice is yours.
  • Avatars! Part of replicating playing around a table is being able to feel like you are there. Our 3D avatars give you that sense of being there. We have lots more planned for avatars in the future!
  • Voice and text chat built in.
  • Solo play! If the game has solo play we add that as well so you can play even if your group isn't available.
  • Mobile first design with simple controls that work equally well on a phone, tablet or computer.
  • All you need a phone, tablet or PC and an Internet connection and you can play with friends no matter where you are.
  • All games officially licensed so you are supporting the publishers and designers of the games.

How does it work?

  • Simply download the app on any available platform, sign up for a free account and start playing!
  • Every month we rotate which games are available to play for free so there's always something free to play.
  • We do offer paid subscriptions that allows you to play any game whenever you want.
  • Start a table and have your friends join or try one of our solo games.

What are the subscription levels?

Sovranti is free-to-play. No paid subscription is required to play.

  • Our free Silver account grants access to any of the games on the free play list which rotate periodically.
  • Our Gold account unlocks all the games so you can play any game at any time.
  • Our Platinum account unlocks all the games for you and everyone else at the table. We often refer to this as our Family or Game Group subscription as only one person at the table needs this account and everyone else can just have a Silver account and you can play whatever you want.

Key features

  • Full Rules Enforcement
  • Automates Scoring
  • Supports 1-8 player games
  • Full voice and text chat built in
  • 3D Environments and Avatars
  • Rotating library of free to play games
  • Cross-platform play between phone, tablet, PC and Mac
